overview: Jim (Larry Herron), is a widower trying to raise his daughter while keeping the peace in a small town. While dealing with his debt to Victor (Tom Sizemore), a mobster, a monster is awakened and begins to wreak havoc. Shara Connolly plays Darla, owner of the local diner; Jaime Gallagher plays the monster; and Brian Thompson plays Al, one of Victor's goons.
title: Made Vicious
